name: A Pharaoh's Gold Las Vegas Progressive Casino Slots
name_original: A Pharaoh's Gold Las Vegas Progressive Casino Slots
description:
The best free to play slot machine game on the app store!

Play this awesome Pharaoh style slot machine, enjoy huge payouts, and multiple levels.

A Pharaoh's Gold Las Vegas Progressive Casino Slots offers the following features:

- Beautiful Pharaoh theme + other bonus slot machines
- Free bonuses from prize wheel to win even more coins and increase your payouts
- Win free boosters and spins! Use boosters to multiply your winnings. Free spins don't count towards your balance
- Game Center integrated

Download this game today for HUGE payouts!
